amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the CBP Camera Technology Initiative.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 71 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to increase funding for the CBP Camera Technology Initiative.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castro (TX) amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 207 (Roll no. 459).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
